alert.note: Alert for Fayette; Greene; Madison (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 27 at 3:23PM EST until February 27 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Fayette County in central Ohio... Southeastern Greene County in west central Ohio... Southern Madison County in central Ohio... * Until 400 PM EST. * At 322 PM EST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Jamestown, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... London, Jamestown, Mount Sterling, Jeffersonville, New Jasper, South Solon, Midway, Bowersville, Milledgeville, Octa, Paintersville, Newport, Chenoweth, Interstate 71 at State Route 38, Rosemoor, Middleton Corner, Madison Mills, Gladstone, Madison Lake and Bookwalter. This includes I-71 in Ohio between mile markers 58 and 87. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM EST for central, southwestern and west central Ohio. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM EST for central, southwestern and west central Ohio.
